title: [EPIC] Bootstrap & Repository Setup
body: Epic: initialize the CosmoFrame (CosmoSim) repository, set up Python tooling, basic layout, and early experiments leading into PS1.x.

title: [EPIC] Engine Architecture Foundations
body: Epic: establish a reusable kernel, integrator structure, force pipeline, and configuration system that all scenarios and physics phases build on.

title: [EPIC] Core Simulation Scenarios
body: Epic: create and refine core scenarios (random N-body, two-body orbit, three-body chaotic) used across diagnostics, visualization, and physics stabilization.

title: [EPIC] Visualization System (Matplotlib + Web)
body: Epic: build the initial visualization stack, from static PNGs to JSON exports and the first web viewer stub.

title: [EPIC] Interactive Python Viewer E1.x
body: Epic: develop the interactive Python viewer with overlays, diagnostics, parameter panel, and live controls for debugging simulations.

title: [EPIC] Web Viewer & Three.js Enhancements E2.x
body: Epic: extend the web viewer with richer controls, overlays, and auto-camera behavior for interactive exploration of JSON-exported simulations.

title: [EPIC] Topology System Foundations
body: Epic: implement topology-aware displacement and distance functions, covering flat, torus, sphere, and bubble topologies.

title: [EPIC] Topology Overlay System
body: Epic: implement grid and bounds overlays and integrate them with exports so visualizations reflect simulation domains and topology context.

title: [EPIC] PSS1.x — Parameterized Scenario System
body: Epic: introduce the Parameterized Scenario System (PSS) with schemas, parsing, merging, and validation to control scenarios declaratively.

title: [EPIC] PSS2.x — Advanced PSS Tooling
body: Epic: extend PSS with deeper validation, better error reporting, and tighter integration with CLI and viewers.

title: [EPIC] Physics Stabilization PS1.x
body: Epic: PS1.x physics stabilization, including softened gravity, integrator abstraction, and improved camera behavior for stable viewing.

title: [EPIC] Physics Stabilization PS2.x
body: Epic: PS2.x physics stabilization, including distance engine, neighbor engine, spatial partitioning, torus fixes, and sphere constraint projection.

title: [EPIC] Diagnostics & Test Infrastructure
body: Epic: build diagnostics, metrics, and test suites ensuring physics, PSS, topology, and visualization changes remain robust.

title: [Bootstrap] Set up Python environment and dependencies
body: Created virtual environment and installed JAX, matplotlib, and required dependencies.

title: [Bootstrap] Implement first simulation loop skeleton
body: Added basic simulation loop with fixed timestep and minimal configuration in cosmosim.py.

title: [Bootstrap] Define minimal body and simulation state representation
body: Implemented early position, velocity, and mass containers for a few bodies.

title: [Engine] Add naive Euler integrator v0
body: Implemented Euler-based update for positions and velocities, wired into the main loop.

title: [Engine] Implement first gravitational force calculation
body: Added direct pairwise Newtonian gravity force computation using nested loops.

title: [Scenarios] Hard-code initial inline scenario
body: Embedded early random or simple multi-body setup directly into cosmosim.py before scenario modularization.

title: [Bootstrap] Introduce CLI argument parsing (argparse)
body: Added --scenario, --steps, and output options enabling command-line simulation control.

title: [Scenarios] Implement scenario registry and extraction
body: Created standalone scenario builder functions and registered them under scenario names.

title: [Scenarios] Implement Random N-Body scenario v1
body: Added random position/velocity initialization and parameterized cluster radius.

title: [Scenarios] Implement Two-Body orbital scenario
body: Created a scenario with a central mass and orbiting body with approximate circular velocity.

title: [Scenarios] Implement Three-Body chaotic scenario
body: Added scenario for chaotic gravitational dynamics to test integrator stability.

title: [Viz] Implement first JSON exporter
body: Added JSON export for positions/velocities enabling offline inspection.

title: [Viz] Implement first PNG snapshot renderer (matplotlib)
body: Added 2D scatter plot renderer for saving PNG frames of simulation output.

title: [Viz] Implement JSON multi-frame exporter (v0)
body: Extended exporter to write full frame sequences for replay or web viewer use.

title: [Viz] Add trajectory plotting capability
body: Added matplotlib trajectory plots to visualize body paths over time.

title: [Engine] Refactor stepping logic into kernel abstraction
body: Extracted physics stepping into kernel_step() for cleaner architecture.

title: [Engine] Move physics functions into engine module
body: Separated force calculations, integrator, and energy functions into engine/.

title: [Engine] Implement energy calculation helpers
body: Added functions for kinetic and potential energy to track simulation drift.

title: [Engine] Add stability checks using energy drift
body: Introduced warnings for sudden divergence or excessive energy error.

title: [Architecture] Introduce base configuration object/dict
body: Created a central configuration structure for dt, steps, N, radius, and topology.

title: [PSS1.x] Implement CLI parameter override system
body: Added custom parameter parsing (--params N=50,radius=10) and merging logic.

title: [PSS1.x] Implement default + scenario parameter merging
body: Scenario defaults now merge with global defaults then apply CLI overrides.

title: [Engine] Convert state arrays to JAX arrays (experiment)
body: Migrated the state container to jax.numpy to test performance and consistency.

title: [Engine] Implement JAX-based force computation experiment
body: Rebuilt gravitational force calculation using jax.numpy and tested accuracy.

title: [Topology] Implement flat topology displacement helper v0
body: Created a simple displacement function for flat Euclidean space.

title: [Topology] Implement torus wrapping experiment v0
body: Added periodic boundary wrapping as a precursor to full torus topology support.

title: [Topology] Prototype sphere displacement calculation
body: Implemented an early approximation of sphere-surface displacement for experimentation.

title: [Viz] Create initial web viewer stub
body: Added empty viewer module verifying JSON fields align with future needs.

title: [Engine] Kernel step loop abstraction
body: Create kernel.step() to unify integration and force computation for all scenarios.

title: [Engine] Velocity Verlet integrator v1
body: Introduce a Velocity Verlet integrator to improve long-term energy behavior over Euler.

title: [Engine] Refactor gravity force pipeline
body: Separate pairwise gravity calculations into reusable functions to prepare for topology-aware logic.

title: [Diagnostics] Kinetic and potential energy utilities
body: Add helper functions for total KE and PE, enabling energy drift diagnostics across scenarios.

title: [Diagnostics] Initial stability investigations
body: Run orbits and random N-body tests to characterize energy drift and integrator behavior.

title: [CLI] Cosmosim unified CLI entrypoint
body: Consolidate multiple entrypoints into cosmosim.py with unified scenario selection, viewer modes, and export options.

title: [CLI] Viewer routing via --view
body: Implement auto, debug, web, and none view modes, routing to Python viewer, JSON export, or headless runs.

title: [CLI] Scenario listing via --list
body: Add --list option to cosmosim.py to enumerate discovered scenarios and their descriptions.

title: [CLI] Legacy script deprecation
body: Mark run_sim.py and jit_run_sim.py as legacy while keeping them functional for backward compatibility.

title: [Viz] JSON frame exporter v1
body: Export per-frame positions, velocities, masses, and actives in a structured JSON suitable for the web viewer.

title: [Viz] Single-file JSON exporter
body: Implement export_simulation_single that runs a simulation and writes config plus all frames into one JSON file.

title: [Viz] Frame dict utilities
body: Add helpers to convert JAX arrays to Python lists/dicts so JSON encoding succeeds cleanly.

title: [PSS1.x] PSS0.x CLI param parsing
body: Add parse_param_string helper to parse comma-separated key=value pairs from --params.

title: [PSS1.x] PSS1.0 schema format
body: Define SCENARIO_PARAMS schema entries including type, default, bounds, and description.

title: [PSS1.x] PSS1.1 schema loading & merging
body: Implement schema discovery, type conversion, and merging with CLI overrides and defaults.

title: [PSS1.x] PSS integration with cosmosim
body: Wire merged_params into scenario builders and UniverseConfig creation in cosmosim.py.

title: [PSS1.x] PSS validation layer
body: Add validation warnings for invalid types, out-of-bounds values, and unknown parameters.

title: [PSS1.x] PSS schema validation helpers
body: Add utilities to validate SCENARIO_PARAMS definitions for consistency.

title: [PSS1.x] PSS test suite expansion
body: Create tests for parameter parsing, merging, validation, and integration with cosmosim.

title: [E1.x] Interactive Python viewer implementation
body: Implement Matplotlib-based interactive viewer with pause, step, reset, overlays, and color modes.

title: [E1.x] Viewer overlay system
body: Add HUD, entity inspector, velocity vectors, and trajectory overlays toggleable via keyboard.

title: [E1.x] UniverseState entity_radius field
body: Extend UniverseState with entity_radius so viewer can render scaled body sizes.

title: [E1.x] Viewer interaction tests
body: Add tests for pause/resume, step-forward, selection, and basic overlay toggles.

title: [E1.3] Diagnostics panel & metrics engine
body: Implement diagnostics pane computing energy, momentum, COM, and velocity histograms in a non-blocking figure.

title: [E1.3] Metrics throttling & history
body: Add capped history buffers and throttled updates to keep diagnostics responsive without hurting frame rate.

title: [E1.3] Metrics test suite
body: Create tests for metric correctness, history pruning, and toggle behavior.

title: [E1.4] Web scenario config panel
body: Add a scenario configuration panel in the web viewer that produces cosmosim.py CLI commands from schema-based forms.

title: [E1.5] Parameter panel in Python viewer
body: Implement a parameter panel that shows scenario name, topology, UniverseConfig, and merged PSS parameters in the viewer.

title: [E1.5] Parameter panel tests & throttling
body: Add tests and throttled updates for the parameter panel to avoid interfering with frame rate.

title: [Overlay] Topology overlay base system
body: Create topology_overlay package with base class, grid, bounds, and factory modules.

title: [Overlay] Grid overlay implementation
body: Implement GridOverlay for drawing grid lines scaled to simulation bounds.

title: [Overlay] Bounds overlay implementation
body: Implement BoundsOverlay to visualize domain boundaries in 2D/3D plots.

title: [Overlay] Overlay integration hooks
body: Wire topology overlays into JSON export so viewers can consume overlay definitions.

title: [Overlay] Overlay tests
body: Add tests verifying overlay structures, line counts, and JSON-serializable output.

title: [PS1.1] Softened gravity implementation
body: Introduce softened gravity in physics_utils to avoid singular forces at small separations.

title: [PS1.1] gravity_softening config option
body: Add gravity_softening parameter to UniverseConfig to control softening radius.

title: [PS1.1] Kernel refactor for gravity utils
body: Refactor kernel and run paths to call compute_gravity_forces instead of inline gravity code.

title: [PS1.1] Softened gravity test suite
body: Add tests verifying softened forces, compatibility with legacy behavior, and symmetry properties.

title: [PS1.2] Integrator abstraction
body: Add integrate_euler and integrate_leapfrog functions and route integration via config parameter.

title: [PS1.2] Integrator tests
body: Add tests confirming default integrator selection and stable behavior of both Euler and Leapfrog.

title: [PS1.5] Auto-camera system
body: Implement auto-camera module for web viewer that frames all bodies via a smooth bounding sphere.

title: [PS1.5] Auto-camera integration & tests
body: Wire auto-camera into Three.js loop and add tests/manual checks for edge cases like empty or extreme simulations.

title: [PS2.1] Distance engine implementation
body: Create distance_utils with compute_offset and compute_distance supporting FLAT, TORUS, SPHERE, and BUBBLE topologies.

title: [PS2.1] Topology config fields
body: Extend UniverseConfig with torus_size and bubble_curvature fields.

title: [PS2.1] Hybrid flat vs topology gravity path
body: Use fast Euclidean path for FLAT and topology-aware path for non-flat topologies in gravity computation.

title: [PS2.1] Distance engine tests
body: Add tests for displacement and distances across all supported topologies, including sphere antipodal cases.

title: [PS2.2] Topology neighbor engine
body: Implement topology_neighbors with compute_topology_offset and neighbor pair generation functions.

title: [PS2.2] Neighbor engine config flag
body: Add enable_neighbor_engine flag to UniverseConfig to gate use of the neighbor engine.

title: [PS2.2] Neighbor engine tests
body: Add tests verifying neighbor pairs and offsets across all topologies.

title: [PS2.3] Spatial partition engine
body: Implement spatial partitioning (hash grid) to accelerate neighbor searches.

title: [PS2.3] Partition-based neighbor iterator
body: Add partitioned neighbor pair generation using neighbor cells from the grid.

title: [PS2.3] Spatial partition flags
body: Add enable_spatial_partition and spatial_cell_size parameters to UniverseConfig.

title: [PS2.3] Spatial partition tests
body: Add tests validating equivalence with naive neighbor enumeration and determinism under JAX.

title: [PS2.4] Torus NaN bug fix
body: Fix NaN behavior in torus wrapping by enforcing consistent bounds and validating configuration.

title: [PS2.4] Sphere constraint projection
body: Add sphere constraint projection to keep positions on a fixed radius and velocities tangent.

title: [PS2.4] Sphere constraint tests
body: Add validation_sphere_geodesic tests to confirm stable constrained motion.

title: [PS2.4] Topology parameter merging fix
body: Ensure topology_type from scenarios survives PSS merging and is used in config creation.

title: [PS2.4] Topology constants alignment
body: Define explicit topology constants and align them across distance and constraint handlers.

title: [PS2.4] export_simulation_single test compatibility
body: Update tests to mock kernel and I/O in export_simulation_single without JAX tracing errors.

title: [PS2.4] MagicMock type coercion fix
body: Coerce topology_type to int safely to avoid recursion and tracing issues in tests.

title: [PS2.4] Cross-topology validation suite
body: Run validation scenarios for torus, sphere, and flat topologies to confirm stability after PS2.4 changes.

title: [Diagnostics] JAX mocking fixes
body: Patch step_simulation in module namespaces in tests to avoid JAX string tracing errors.

title: [Diagnostics] CLI test suite updates
body: Refactor tests to focus on cosmosim.py CLI behavior and legacy script compatibility.

title: [Docs] README refinement
body: Update README to document PS phases, topology overlays, and interface enhancements.

title: [Docs] Walkthrough index creation
body: Create an index of major walkthrough docs for CosmoFrame (CosmoSim) project history and onboarding.
